section.name: Derek C. Ashmore
section.p: Derek C. Ashmore is the author of the Java EE Architect's Handbook, Second Edition. He is widely published with most recent publications including articles in JavaPro and the Java Developers Journal. Derek routinely publishes in his blog, which is here.

Derek is the managing consultant and CTO for Delta Vortex Technologies. He routinely provides consulting services for companies designing and developing commercial web applications. Derek can be reached at derek.ashmore@dvtconsulting.com.
